column4: morning all, i need some advice on installing ubuntu to an ssd. I have windows on its own separate drive and will be giving Ubuntu the whole SSD. Will grub still properly overwrite the windows boot loader even though its on another drive?
you can specify the drive it goes on
to be honest though, I'd just change boot order in the BIOS and leave the Windows bootloader intact
dr_willis ok thanks guys, will do!
